data.title: Bruce Willis (Actor)
data.meta_description: Best known for his role as John McClane in the "Die Hard" series. He has appeared in over 60 films, including "Pulp Fiction",...
data.text:
Bruce Willis

Full Name: Walter Bruce Willis

Profession: Actor

Biography: Best known for his role as John McClane in the "Die Hard" series. He has appeared in over 60 films, including "Pulp Fiction", "Armageddon", "The Sixth Sense", and "Sin City".

Born: March 19, 1955

Birthplace: Idar-Oberstein, West Germany

Age: 69 years old

Generation: Baby Boomer

Chinese Zodiac: Goat/Sheep

Star Sign: Pisces

Historical Events

"Moonlighting" with Cybill Shepard & Bruce Willis premieres on ABC TV in the US

39th Emmy Awards: LA Law, Bruce Willis & Sharon Gless win

"Die Hard" directed by John McTiernan and starring Bruce Willis and Alan Rickman is released in the US

Science fiction film "The Fifth Element" written and directed by Luc Besson, starring Bruce Willis and Milla Jovovich is released. Then the most expensive European film ever made.

"The Sixth Sense", starring Bruce Willis, Toni Collette, and Haley Joel Osment, premieres

Bruce Willis announces he is stepping away from acting after a diagnosis of aphasia

Personal Life

American actress Demi Moore (25) weds American actor Bruce Willis (32) at The Little White Chapel in Las Vegas; divorce in 2000

Actress Demi Moore (37) divorces actor Bruce Willis (45) due to irreconcilable differences after 13 years of marriage

Star of Die Hard film Bruce Willis (52) weds model and actress Emma Heming (29) in Turks and Caicos Islands

Biographies and Sources

Bruce Willis, stepping away from career, leaves behind prodigious film legacy - NBC News

Famous Actors

Charlie Day

Charlie Heaton

Freddie Highmore

Ice-T

Jimmy Durante
